name: noa-examples
description: Starter examples of game worlds using the noa voxel engine

scripts.build1: rm -f web/docs/test/*.js*; cd web/src/test && webpack --env prod
scripts.build2: rm -f web/docs/hello-world/*.js*; cd web/src/hello-world && webpack --env prod
scripts.build: npm run build1 && npm run build2

author: Andy Hall
